alert.note: Alert for Big Island East; Big Island Interior; Big Island North; Big Island South; Big Island Southeast; Kohala; Kona (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 08 at 11:47PM HST until March 09 at 6:00AM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FOR LOWER ELEVATIONS OF THE BIG ISLAND UNTIL 6 AM HST THURSDAY... ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FOR THE BIG ISLAND SUMMITS UNTIL 6 PM HST SUNDAY... ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FOR THE HALEAKALA SUMMIT UNTIL 6 AM HST THURSDAY... .Strong and gusty winds will continue for lower elevations across the Big Island tonight then diminish Thursday. Dangerously strong winds will affect the higher elevations on the Big Island and Haleakala. The winds will be particularly long lasting over the Big Island summits. ...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM HST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Southwest to west winds 25 to 35 mph with localized gusts over 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Lower elevations of the Big Island. * WHEN...Until 6 AM HST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Winds this strong can tear off shingles, knock down tree branches, blow away tents and unsecured objects, and make it difficult to drive, particularly for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Watch out for falling tree branches when walking or driving. Make sure tents and awnings are secure or take them down. Be prepared for power outages.

area.areaDesc: Big Island East; Big Island Interior; Big Island North; Big Island South; Big Island Southeast; Kohala; Kona
